snippet: Grenada County’s circuit clerk, Linda Barnette, resigned Tuesday, saying that issuing marriage licenses to same-sex couples violates her religious beliefs.
abstract: Grenada County, Miss, circuit clerk Linda Barnette resigns in protest of having to issue same-sex couples marriage licenses, citing her religious beliefs.
lead_paragraph: Grenada County’s circuit clerk, Linda Barnette, resigned Tuesday, saying that issuing marriage licenses to same-sex couples violates her religious beliefs.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
